Room.RoomText: You hear a loud yell, when you look back you find your friend laying on the floor harmed. When you further inspect him you see that his leg is twisted.
Room.RoomDescription: I need to find stuff so I can help him.

Room.RoomText: It looks like no one has been here for a while. However, the last people appeared to have left some stuff.
Room.RoomDescription: You find an box, when you try to open it you find out it's locked.

Room.RoomText: On the left everything is overgrown. It seems some small animals have been crossing this path.
Room.RoomDescription: When you take another step, you feel something strange underneath your foot. It's stuck in the ground.

Room.RoomText: A crisscross of animal footprints are to been seen on the ground, I have to watch my step. I think i see a bear footprint. At your North you see a rockwall, seems dangerous.
Room.RoomDescription: When you look up you see a rope hanging in the trees.

Room.RoomText: The traintrack you walk on probably have been used by the miners in the old days.
Room.RoomDescription: At first glance you only see some rusted metal parts.

Room.RoomText: An old Mine, it's hammered shut and has an warning sign on it. The path up ahead doesn't look safe, I could fall off the path if I dont have something to tie me down.
Room.RoomDescription: You look through the gaps in the wood, you see something shimmering. I can't reach that.

Room.RoomText: Finnaly, I've reached the watchtower. Now I can call for help.
Room.RoomDescription: The stairs are broken, I can't climb up without a rope or such.

Room.RoomText: I finnaly reached the top of the cliff, the watchtower is should be really close now.
Room.RoomDescription: When you look up, the glass of the watchtower reflects the sun in your eyes. I better hurry up.

Room.RoomText: I better watch my step, loose rocks all up the path.
Room.RoomDescription: When you knock off the loose rocks off the path, you see a knife.

Room.RoomText: Dense shrubs and tall trees all around you. Again that rock cliff, only way up is with a hiking tool.
